backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a party ledger system with CRUD operations for parties, payments, visit records, shop branding, user profiles, and location-based filtering with pagination and aggregation capabilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: default date range filter set to today's date on MapPage load, and a search button to trigger map data filtering.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend TypeScript/React files covering routing, React Query hooks, utility functions, components for layout/branding/auth/alerts, and pages for parties/reports/settings/visits/map functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements like backgrounds, borders, cards, and charts.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that includes Leaflet and Leaflet MarkerCluster CSS dependencies for map functionality and mounts the React app at #root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring React Query, TanStack Router with routes for dashboard/parties/reports/settings/visits/map, theme provider, actor session context, and error boundary.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddAdminPr: Dialog component for adding new admin principals with Principal ID validation, form submission handling, and loading states using React Query mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPrinc: Admin panel displaying a table of admin principals with add/remove functionality, current user highlighting, and protection against removing the last admin.
frontend/src/components/admin/StaffManag: Component for managing staff members (file content truncated in input).
frontend/src/components/alerts/DueTodayD: Alert dialog component that displays parties with payments due today, allowing users to view party details by clicking on them or navigating via a View button.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Full-screen card component that displays an access denied message with an optional custom reason when users lack required permissions.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Error screen shown when application initialization fails, providing retry and page reload options.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login screen component with Internet Identity authentication, displaying a branded card with login button and loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Error screen specifically for profile loading failures, offering retry and reload functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup, collecting the user's name with form validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ResetAdminP: Empty file placeholder for admin password reset dialog component.
frontend/src/components/auth/StaffLoginS: Empty file placeholder for staff-specific login screen component.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupLoad: Simple loading screen with spinner and customizable message displayed during application startup.
frontend/src/components/auth/TopLevelErr: React error boundary component that catches top-level errors and displays a self-contained error UI with reload functionality, using inline styles to avoid dependency on app providers.
frontend/src/components/branding/Brandin: Header component displaying shop logo and name from branding settings, with fallback to default values.
Settings card for managing shop branding including name input and logo upload with progress tracking, using ExternalBlob for file handling.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TodayN: Dashboard card component that displays parties with payments due today, showing loading state, empty state, or a list of parties with call buttons.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Upcomi: Displays a calendar-based view of upcoming payments with date selection, showing parties with payments due on the selected date. Includes phone call links and navigation to party details.
frontend/src/components/import/ExcelPart: Provides Excel/CSV file import functionality for bulk party creation with preview, validation, batch processing, and detailed success/failure reporting.
Main application layout component with navigation bar, branding header, footer with caffeine.ai attribution, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/parties/PartyFor: Modal dialog for adding or editing party information including name, address, phone, PAN, and due amount with automatic party ID generation.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Modal dialog for recording payments with amount, comment, and optional next payment date fields, requiring next payment date when amount is zero.
Displays a list of payment records with metadata including payment ID, next payment date indicator, and location saved status.
frontend/src/components/settings/Princip: Shows the user's Internet Identity Principal ID with copy-to-clipboard functionality for sharing with administrators.
frontend/src/components/transfer/JsonTra: React component providing UI for exporting and importing application data as JSON, with options to merge or overwrite existing data.
frontend/src/components/visits/PartyVisi: Dialog component for recording party visits with payment amount, date/time, next payment date, comments, and automatic geolocation capture.
frontend/src/context/ActorSessionContext: React context providing actor session state (backend interface, loading states, errors) and a stable principal key for query invalidation.
frontend/src/context/AppReadinessContext: Empty file, likely a placeholder for application readiness state management.
frontend/src/context/StaffAuthContext.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for staff authentication context.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminPrinc: React Query hooks for managing admin principals (get, add, remove) and checking if caller is admin, with temporary extended actor interface.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuth.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile (name) with caching and invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useBranding.t: React Query hooks for getting and setting shop branding (name and logo) with caching.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useMapLocatio: React Query hook that fetches parties with visit location data for map visualization, filtering by date range and requiring authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useParties.ts: React Query hooks for party CRUD operations including fetching all parties, getting single party details, validating/generating party IDs, and adding parties.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePayments.t: React Query hooks for fetching party payment metadata and recording payments/visits, with automatic cache invalidation for related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStaffPermi: Stub implementation indicating staff authentication has been removed; returns no-op hooks for permissions and authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTodayDashb: React Query hook that aggregates today's visit records across all parties, calculating total visits and amounts with automatic refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTodayNotif: React Query hook that fetches parties with payments due today, refreshing every minute.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTransfer.t: React Query mutations for exporting and importing upgrade data with cache invalidation on import.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUpcomingPa: React Query hook that fetches parties with next payment dates matching a selected date, sorted by party name.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor with Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorSafe.ts: Alternative actor hook with explicit error handling and retry logic, without automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDueTodayAlert.ts: Simplified stub hook for due-today alerts with dismissal functionality; full implementation disabled for performance reasons.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and session lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors, including primary, secondary, and chart color definitions.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parsePartiesFromE: CSV parser that extracts party data (name, address, phone, PAN, due amount) from uploaded files with validation and error reporting.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Provides formatting and parsing utilities for money (bigint to INR string), phone numbers, and PAN identifiers.
frontend/src/lib/phone.ts: Contains utilities to normalize phone numbers and create tel: links for clickable phone numbers.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Handles conversion between JavaScript Date objects and backend Time (bigint nanoseconds), plus formatting and datetime-local input string utilities.
frontend/src/lib/transfer/jsonTransfer.t: Implements JSON export/import for UpgradeData with bigint serialization, file download, parsing, and merge logic for parties and visit records.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays today's dashboard with visit count, total amount collected, notifications, upcoming payments calendar, and a list of today's visits with navigation to party details.
frontend/src/pages/MapPage.tsx: Renders an interactive Leaflet map with marker clustering showing party visit locations, filterable by date range, with dynamic loading of Leaflet and MarkerCluster libraries from CDN.
frontend/src/pages/NewPartyVisitPage.tsx: Provides a searchable party selection interface to initiate recording a new visit, opening a PartyVisitFormDialog when a party is selected.
frontend/src/pages/PartiesPage.tsx: Lists all parties with search functionality, displays party cards with due amounts, and provides buttons to add new parties or navigate to party detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/PartyDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a single party including contact details, balance, payment history, and provides actions to edit, delete, add payments, or record visits.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Shows payment history and analytics for selected parties with search functionality to filter parties by name, phone, or PAN.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Tabbed settings interface for profile, branding, data import, data transfer, and admin panel (for admin users only).
frontend/src/pages/VisitDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed information about a specific party visit including amount, date/time, comments, next payment date, and location.
frontend/src/utils/staffSession.ts: Empty utility file for staff session management (no content).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, container settings, typography plugin, and custom animations for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document indicating a party map application with date filtering features, including two pending feature requests for default date filtering and search button functionality.
